data.convo: Hello , my name is Bill Martin and we have a reservation for party tonight . Yes , what can I do for you ? I need to cancel that . We have had a last minute change of plans . I see . Would you like me to reschedule you for another night ? OK , we will let you know as early as possible . By the way , will we be able to get a refund on this cancellation ? Certainly . Thank you very much . That's all right . I hope we can help you at some other time . Good-bye . Good-bye .
